channel.title: Annoying Compile Error
channel.description: Every time I compile a client, no matter which one it is and without even editting it, I get the error: "error: Class names, 'client.JAVA', are only accepted if annotation processing is explicitly requested". I am very new to this and I don't know what it means or how to fix it. And I think that dosent let me finish compiling which means I dont know whether I edited things properly. I badly need help.

item.title: Annoying Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @ricar144 ricar144
item.description:
@ricar144 wrote:

Every time I compile a client, no matter which one it is and without even editting it, I get the error: “error: Class names, ‘client.JAVA’, are only accepted if annotation processing is explicitly requested”. I am very new to this and I don’t know what it means or how to fix it. And I think that dosent let me finish compiling which means I dont know whether I edited things properly. I badly need help.

Read full topic
